snippet: Also, President Obama outspends Mr. Romney in TV ads in battleground states, and a 2007 video of Mr. Obama is re-examined on Fox News.
abstract: Also, President Obama outspends Mr. Romney in TV ads in battleground states, and a 2007 video of Mr. Obama is re-examined on Fox News.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Debate No. 1 Arrives, and NBC Likes Three New Shows
